name: unamplified
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
Unamplified sounds have not been played through an amplifier (= an electrical device) in order to make them louder: I really enjoy listening to unamplified live music. The power failed, and I had to make the presentation using just my unamplified voice. Related word
amplify
More examplesFewer examplesWe only allow acoustic instruments and unamplified voices in the café.They produced a range of unamplified instruments and started to play some traditional folk tunes.At one point, she turned off the microphone and treated us to some unamplified singing.
